name: CheapVoip Cheap Line
description: CheapVoip Line enables you to save on your monthly calling charges by over 80%! The CheapVoip MobileVOIP app lets you make cheap or even free international calls through WiFi or 3G networks. You can choose any contact from your regular contact list or add new contacts. If you are already a CheapVoip Line user, you can import the contacts from your CheapVoip client as well.  Simply follow these three easy steps to start saving immediately:  1. Download the free CheapVoip dialer app 2. Register a username or log in using your existing credentials 3. Buy some credits 4. Get on the Line and start saving money!  With CheapVoip Line youll get the first 90 days of calls to selected destinations for FREE after buying 10 euro credit! Youll only start using your bought credit after these 90 days have expired. You can also use your credit for any calls to non-free destinations. Even for the destinations which arent free, CheapVoip Line charges the LOWEST rates available; you wont find a cheaper telecom provider!  Saving was never this easy!    Using our app as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.
